Text: Re Reissue payment requestI was looking through some outstanding items on my desk and found this AP is still waiting on you to provide wiring information for the Price Waterhouse invoice Company does not have the ability to process a check Let me know if you have any questions Carolyn From Dana Davis ECT PM To Carolyn NRON cc Lisa CT Subject Reissue payment request These are the request that can be paid out of Co Vendor Vendor Amount Price Waterhouse Coopers Canadian andor June Standard Life Tower th Avenue SW Suite Calgary Alberta Canada Blake Cassels Graydon LLP US nd Street SW Canadian East Tower Bankers Hall US Suite Calgary Alberta Canada This one below needs to be paid out of Co Gardere Wynne Sewell Riggs LLP US Louisiana Suite Houston TX We also will sendfax the pmt request if necessary Thanks again for your help ddavis
